formalpara.title: Figure 1. Gene map of the C. elegans mtDNA
formalpara.para: The molecule contains the genes for twelve proteins (thick grey arrows), two rRNAs (black arrows), and 22 tRNAs (circles labeled with one-letter amino acid code). The serine and leucine tRNAs are also identified by the codon family recognized. The positions of the putative D-loop and of the uaDf5 deletion mutation are indicated inside and outside the circle, respectively.
